name: Magibullet Shooter The Kid
desc: You can activate "Magibullet" Spell/Trap Cards from your hand during either player's turn. If a Spell/Trap Card is activated in the same column as this card (except during the Damage Step): You can discard 1 "Magibullet" card; draw 2 cards. You can only use this effect of "Magibullet Shooter The Kid" once per turn.
